name: Last Slime Standing
description:
Last Slime Standing is a bullet-hell videogame, in which you, as the last good slime remaining (Slooom), fight evil slimes, in an abandoned farm, using different types of weapons and chaotic mechanics.

Numerous tools of destruction at disposal

The player has 3 types of weapons:

  1. A pistol with infinite ammo
  2. A riffle with rapid firing pattern
  3. A shotgun with spreading and high-damage firing pattern
  4. A rocket launcher with 4 missiles and high damage per area
Day/night horrifying cycle

The day/night cycle control everything in-game, there are 3 stages as follows:

  1. Preparation Phase: In this phase the player can buy ammo and HP, while preparing for the upcoming wave
  2. Day Phase: In this phase the player fights enemies with default stats and spawn rate
  3. Night Phase: In this phase everything speeds up and the fight becomes more intense, enemies spawning faster and being stronger
Chaos barrels that take you by surprise

Shooting these barrels, the player receives a random buff or debuff, with one of the following effects:

  1. QuadDamange BUFF
  2. Heal BUFF
  3. Poison over time DEBUFF
  4. Bonus Speed BUFF
Allies in time of need

During the preparation phase, the player can use the shop and buy more ammo and HP, that will help him for the upcoming waves.

Objective

Resist the chaos as much as you can, while killing enemy slimes, obtaining slimeballs from them, and stacking up resources for future waves.

Controls

Mouse Move - Rotate

Mouse Left Click - Shoot

W, A, S, D - Move

1, 2, 3, 4 - Switch between weapons (pistol, rifle, shotgun, rocket launcher)
